game_description: Unleash your creativity in this intuitive, fun, Creative Space. Creative Space is a VR wonderland for artist, creatives or people who just want to mess around with its easy to use interface and open environment. * Easy to understand gameplay * Intuitive design * Create anything using the orbs and cubes at your disposal * Easily save a project and load it next time you want to work on it Creative Space is a must have for any Meta Quest owner.
